attributes.background: Currently all Children’s antibiotic medicine contains harmful E numbers and artificial sweeteners. I’m starting this petition for manufacturing companies to use only natural colourings and sweeteners in their medicines that are better for our children’s health and well being.

rejection.details: This would be the responsibility of the manufacturing companies and not the UK Government or Parliament.
